name: Dreamer: Puzzle
description:
History

Discover the story behind a boy who has a touching reality.

Experiences

The scenes will be based on this boy's narrative through puzzle pieces, which will tell the moments of sadness and happiness experienced by him.

Challenges

Each art will have its respective difficulty, making the game interactive and challenging.

Pleasant

With soft music and a relaxing atmosphere, enjoy this experience by assembling and remounting the game's many challenges.
